channel.title: Posts on Mike J. O'Brien
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Mike J. O'Brien

item.title: Club Moto Practice
item.description: Practice at Club Moto in Livermore, CA. Unedited and Raw GoPro files from 08/12/2017

item.title: Club Moto Race
item.description: OTHG race at Club Moto in Livermore, CA. Unedited and Raw GoPro files from 05/13/2017

item.title: Fresh Powder at Diamond Peak
item.description: Fresh powder over night and snow everywhere. Unedited and Raw GoPro files from 02/26/2017 at DiamondPeak in Incline Village, Nevada.

item.title: Street Safety
item.description: Attended the California Rider education training course over the weekend in Alameda, CA. 17 hours of in class instruction and outdoor riding. Great time to refresh my skills on the bike.

item.title: Fresh Powder at Sugarbowl
item.description: Little windy at the peak, but so much snow. Unedited and Raw GoPro files from 01/13/2017 at SugarBowl in Lake Tahoe, CA.

item.title: Configured HTTPS
item.description: Configured my website to use https, not http. Leveraged CloudFront and Certificate Manager. Quick and easy setup. Detailed walkthrough from Simone Carletti. Redirecting a domain with HTTPS using Amazon S3 and CloudFront Quick and dirty AWS tutorial series video.

item.title: Configured Hugo
item.description: Migrated, installed and setup personal website today using Hugo, which is a static site generator written in Go.

item.title: My 2016 Book List
item.description: Books I read in 2016. The Phoenix Project A Novel About IT, DevOps, and Helping Your Business Win Written by: Gene Kim , Kevin Behr , George Spafford The Like Switch An Ex-FBI Agent’s Guide to Influencing, Attracting, and Winning People Over Written by: Jack Schafer , Marvin Karlins Team of Teams New Rules of Engagement for a Complex World Written by: General Stanley McChrystal , Tantum Collins , David Silverman , Chris Fussell

item.title: My 2016 Podcast List
item.description: Unordered iTunes podcast library The Food Fight Show AWS re:Invent 2015 a16z TedTalks Health TedTalks Business TedTalks Technology Arrested DevOps The CloudCast.net Weekly Cloud Computing The Ship Show Manager Tools TestTalks | Automation Awesomeness Helping You Succeed With Test Automation Pivot: Code the Industrial Internet Google Cloud Platform Microsoft Azure Cloud Cover Show channel 9

item.description: Passed the AWS Certified SysOps Administrator - Associate Level exam today. Certificate number 5917.
